page.title: 05Lundin Links
page.content: Lundin Links is situated on a raised beach consisting of three steps.The town itself is mainly situated on the flat areas,while the golf courses are on the slopes.On the highist slope crops such as turnips,barley etc. are cultivated on the sandy soil. Lundin Links was formed round the site of Lundin Mill. The major period of growth in Lundin Links began in 1860.Although the first 20 years were relatively slow. Lundin Links was developed into the most attractive holiday resort in Fife.New streets were added and roads were formed on the slopes overlooking the dunes.This town has since then expanded in a linear fashion along the main A915 trunk road.
